channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- GravityZone Console On-Premise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- GravityZone Console On-Premise

item.title: CVE-2024-4177|2024-06-06T13:16:59.465Z -- bitdefender -- gravityzone%20console%20on-premise
item.description: A host whitelist parser issue in the proxy service implemented in the GravityZone Update Server allows an attacker to cause a server-side request forgery. This issue only affects GravityZone Console versions before 6.38.1-2 that are running only on premise.

item.title: CVE-2024-4177|2024-06-06T07:59:22.990Z -- bitdefender -- gravityzone%20console%20on-premise
item.description: A host whitelist parser issue in the proxy service implemented in the GravityZone Update Server allows an attacker to cause a server-side request forgery. This issue only affects GravityZone Console versions before 6.38.1-2 that are running only on premise.
